mapper.select: insert attendees (id, kidId, userId,eventId, createdTime,lastModifiedTime) values (#{id},#{kidId},#{userId},#{eventId},now(),now())
update attendees set kidId=#{kidId}, userId=#{userId}, status=#{status} where lastModifiedTime = #{lastModifiedTime} and status = 0 and id = #{id}
select * from attendees where eventId = #{eventId} and status > 0
select * from attendees where eventId = #{eventId} and status = 0
